fields.text: Thank you for calling Kleiner Perkins, San Francisco venture capital partners investing in bold founders from inception to IPO and beyond.
For inquiries regarding our existing portfolio companies, press [INDEX].
To reach your Kleiner Perkins partner, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to your partner. Your call is important to us.
For accounting or billing questions, press [INDEX].
One moment please, connecting you to our finance team.
If you are an entrepreneur seeking funding for a new venture, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our investment intake team.
To learn about our investment criteria, press [INDEX].
One moment please, transferring you to our investment criteria specialist.
